mapper.insert: insert into tbl_calendar (calno, fk_cno, calname, color, shareEmp) values(calnoSeq.nextval, #{fk_cno}, #{calname}, #{color}, #{shareEmp})
mapper.select: select calno, calname, color, fk_cno from tbl_calendar where shareemp like '%'|| #{empid} ||'%'
select title, startdate, enddate, color from tbl_calendar C JOIN tbl_schedule S ON C.CALNO = S.FK_CALNO where SHAREEMP like '%'|| #{empid} ||'%'
